title: Potato Greens
directions: Note: If your potato greens are not fresh, soak them in water for 2 hours before the cooking time.
Step 1: In the cooking pot, put the meat and fish. Then add 1 of water and salt. Bring it boil for 10 minutes.
Step 2: Remove the fish from pot and set aside, let it cool down for few minutes, then remove de bones.
Step3: Add the potato greens with the remaining water and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step 4: Add the onion, spring onion, bouillon cubes and palm oil .
Step 5: Add hot pepper and salt. Then return the fish in the pot and the sliced okra. simmer on medium heat for 20 minutes.
Stir the sauce regularly, the sauce is ready when all the liquid is totally absorb
Serve it with rice and enjoy.
ingredients: 300g sweet potato leaves, finely chopped and washed
